Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
This class is a model of the game ConnectFour. This is my submission for the Ovarro Software Engineer Technical Test for the 2024 Graduate Software Engineer position.
Since:
2024-05-06

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(int width, int height, int winningRowLength)
      Constructor to initialise a new game with custom grid size and winning row length.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the grid.
      height - The height of the grid.
      winningRowLength - The length of the winning row.

  • Method Details

    • getGridSize

      public int[] getGridSize()
      Method to get the size of the grid
      Returns:
      gridSize The grid size is an array containing the width and height

    • getGrid

      public char[][] getGrid()
      Method to get the grid
      Returns:
      grid The grid is a 2d array on which the game is being played

    • getWinningRowLength

      public int getWinningRowLength()
      Method to get the length of a winning combination
      Returns:
      winningRowLength The length of a winning combination

    • addToken

      public boolean addToken​(int column)
      Method to add a token to the game grid.
      Parameters:
      column - The column where the token should be added.
      Returns:
      true if the token was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • showGridState

      public void showGridState()
      Method to show the game grid state/progress.

    • getNextPlayer

      public char getNextPlayer()
      Method to get the next player to play.
      Returns:
      The next player (either 'R' or 'Y').

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public char getCurrentPlayer()
      Method to get current player.
      Returns:
      The current player (either 'R' or 'Y').

    • checkWinner

      public char checkWinner​(char[][] board, int winningRowLength)
      Method to check if there is a winner.
      Parameters:
      board - The board that is being checked
      winningRowLength - The winning row length associated with the board
      Returns:
      The winner player ('R' or 'Y') if there is a winner, '.' if no winner yet.

    • playGame

      public static void playGame​(Game game)
      Method containing the logic to play the game
      Parameters:
      game - An instance of the game that is being played

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Main method to accept user input for the parameters required to run the game. It attempts to start the game after verifying the inputs are correct.
